comments: This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool. Call-up to provide consulting engineering services (drawings specifications and assessment inspections) for a combined total of three projects. The projects are the North Landing Wharf Retrofit, the Penstock Gate and Cylinder Refurbishment, the Auxiliary Tunnel Safety Gate Installation and the North Landing Wharf Dock Entrance Stop#1 North Crack Stabilization at the Esquimalt Graving Dock.
